flavorText: As Sigarda and Sorin battled, Arlinn and Teferi recovered the key from the Markov catacombs.

foreignData.flavorText: Während Sigarda und Sorin kämpften, bargen Arlinn und Teferi den Schlüssel aus den Markov-Katakomben.
foreignData.name: Geheimnisse des Schlüssels
foreignData.text:
Stelle Nachforschungen an. Falls dieser Zauberspruch aus einem Friedhof gewirkt wurde, stelle stattdessen zweimal Nachforschungen an. (Um Nachforschungen anzustellen, erzeuge einen farblosen Hinweis-Artefaktspielstein mit „{2}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Ziehe eine Karte.")
Rückblende {3}{U}

foreignData.flavorText: Mientras Sigarda y Sorin luchaban entre sí, Arlinn y Teferi recuperaron la llave de las catacumbas Markov.
foreignData.name: Secretos de la llave
foreignData.text:
Investiga. Si este hechizo fue lanzado desde un cementerio, en vez de eso, investiga dos veces. (Para investigar, crea una ficha de artefacto Pista incolora con "{2}, sacrificar este artefacto: Roba una carta".)
Retrospectiva {3}{U}.

foreignData.flavorText: Tandis que Sigarda et Sorin combattaient, Arlinn et Téfeiri récupérèrent la clé dans les catacombes de Markov.
foreignData.name: Secrets de la clé
foreignData.text:
Enquêtez. Si ce sort a été lancé depuis un cimetière, enquêtez deux fois à la place. (Pour enquêter, créez un jeton d'artefact incolore Indice avec « {2}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Piochez une carte. »)
Flashback {3}{U}

foreignData.flavorText: Mentre Sigarda e Sorin combattevano, Arlinn e Teferi recuperarono la chiave dalle catacombe Markov.
foreignData.name: Segreti della Chiave
foreignData.text:
Indaga. Se questa magia è stata lanciata da un cimitero, invece indaga due volte. (Per indagare, crea una pedina artefatto Indizio incolore con "{2}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Pesca una carta".)
Flashback {3}{U}

foreignData.flavorText: シガルダとソリンが戦っている間に、アーリンとテフェリーはマルコフの地下墓地から鍵を見つけ出した。
foreignData.name: 鍵の秘密
foreignData.text:
調査を行う。この呪文が墓地から唱えられたなら、代わりに２回調査を行う。（調査を行うとは、「{2}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：カード１枚を引く。」を持つ無色の手掛かり・アーティファクト・トークン１つを生成することである。）
フラッシュバック{3}{U}

foreignData.flavorText: 시가르다와 소린이 싸우는 동안, 아를린과 테페리는 마르코프 지하묘지에서 열쇠를 회수했다.
foreignData.name: 열쇠의 비밀
foreignData.text:
조사한다. 이 주문이 무덤에서 발동되었다면, 대신 두 번 조사한다. (조사를 하려면, "{2}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다."를 가진 무색 단서 마법물체 토큰 한 개를 만든다.)
회상 {3}{U}

foreignData.flavorText: Enquanto Sigarda e Sorin lutavam, Arlinn e Teferi resgatavam a chave das catacumbas dos Markov.
foreignData.name: Segredos da Chave
foreignData.text:
Investigue. Se esta mágica tiver sido conjurada de um cemitério, em vez disso, investigue duas vezes. (Para investigar, crie uma ficha de artefato Pista incolor com "{2}, sacrifique este artefato: Compre um card".)
Recapitular {3}{U}

foreignData.flavorText: Пока Сигарда и Сорин сражались, Арлинн и Тефери добыли ключ из катакомб дома Марковых.
foreignData.name: Секреты Ключа
foreignData.text:
Используйте Дознание. Если это заклинание было разыграно из кладбища, вместо этого используйте Дознание дважды. (Чтобы использовать Дознание, создайте одну фишку бесцветного артефакта Улика со способностью «{2}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: возьмите карту».)
Воспоминание {3}{U}

foreignData.flavorText: 趁着席嘉妲和索霖交锋时，雅琳和泰菲力趁机从马可夫家墓穴中取回了钥匙。
foreignData.name: 钥匙奥秘
foreignData.text:
探查。如果此咒语是从坟墓场中施放，则改为探查两次。（探查的流程是派出一个无色线索衍生神器，且其具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌。」）
返照{3}{U}

foreignData.flavorText: 趁著席嘉妲和索霖交鋒時，雅琳和泰菲力趁機從馬可夫家墓穴中取回了鑰匙。
foreignData.name: 鑰匙奧秘
foreignData.text:
探查。如果此咒語是從墳墓場中施放，則改為探查兩次。（探查的流程是派出一個無色線索衍生神器，且其具有「{2}，犧牲此神器：抽一張牌。」）
返照{3}{U}

name: Secrets of the Key
originalText:
Investigate. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, investigate twice instead. (To investigate, create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Flashback {3}{U}

rulings.text: “Flashback [cost]” means “You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying [cost] rather than paying its mana cost” and “If the flashback cost was paid, exile this card instead of putting it anywhere else any time it would leave the stack.”

You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions, including those based on the card's type. For instance, you can cast a sorcery using flashback only when you could normally cast a sorcery.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a flashback cost) you're paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.
A spell cast using flashback will always be exiled afterward, whether it resolves, is countered, or leaves the stack in some other way.
You can cast a spell using flashback even if it was somehow put into your graveyard without having been cast.
If a card with flashback is put into your graveyard during your turn, you can cast it if it's legal to do so before any other player can take any actions.

text:
Investigate. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, investigate twice instead. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")
Flashback {3}{U}
